quote: T he difference between ordinary and extraordinary is that little extra.
author: Jimmy Johnson

quote: E xercise is a celebration of what your body can do. Not a punishment for what you ate.
author: Joycelyn Elders

quote: I t is never too late to be strong.
author: Rodney Dangerfield

quote: O ur bodies are our gardens, and our wills are our gardeners.
author: Voltaire

quote: P hysical fitness is not only a desirable goal in itself, it is also the foundation of so many other things.
author: Joseph Pilates

quote: D on't let the fear of striking out keep you from playing the game.
author: Babe Ruth

quote: Y ou don't have to be great to start, but you have to start to be great.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: T ough times don't last. Tough people do.
author: Susan Gale

quote: T he only person you are destined to become is the person you decide to be.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: I t's going to be hard, but hard does not mean impossible.
author: Unknown

quote: T he best way to predict your future is to create it.
author: Abraham Lincoln

quote: S weat is the perfume of victory.
author: Pat Riley

quote: I t's not about being the best. It's about being better than you were yesterday.
author: Unknown

quote: T he only bad workout is the one you didn't do.
author: Unknown

quote: Y ou miss 100% of the shots you don't take.
author: Wayne Gretzky

quote: T ake care of your body. It's the only place you have to live.
author: Jim Rohn

quote: E xercise is king, nutrition is queen. Put them together and you have a kingdom.
author: Jack LaLanne

quote: D on't compare yourself to others. Compare yourself to who you were yesterday.
author: Unknown

quote: I t's not what happens to you, it's what you do about it.
author: W.C. Fields

quote: P ain is temporary. Quitting lasts forever.
author: Lance Armstrong
